00030 #ifndef _EXTLIB_H_
00031 #define _EXTLIB_H_
00032 
00033 /*************************************************************************
00034 Name: HEX (inline function)
00035     
00036 Input:    unsigned char val
00037 
00038           
00039 Returns:  char
00040 *************************************************************************/
00041 inline char HEX(unsigned char val)
00042 {
00043     if((val += '0') > '9')
00044     {
00045         val += ('A' - '0' - 0x0A);
00046     }
00047     
00048     return val;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 extern unsigned char atoc(unsigned char *pStr);

00054 extern void BlockRdEEPROM(unsigned char *eeprom, unsigned char *ram, unsigned char count);
00055 extern void __sprintf_P(char *__s, const char *__fmt, ...) __attribute__((naked));
00056 
00057 #endif // _EXTLIB_H_
